transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello ha ji shubham sir govind baat kar raha hu sir india mart se.
Customer: Ji bhaiya bataye.
Executive: Ji sir wo last time baat ho nahi paya tha aap busy ho gaye the aap bata rahe the.
Customer: Ha ji ha ji asal me sir bhaiya ye mai cheez puchna chah raha hu mai bhi abhi wale india mart ka dekh raha tha actually mere ek aur kind of client hai but friend hai unse bhi discuss kar raha tha.
Executive: To.
Customer: To utna mujhe matlab profile jo bhi hai samajh nahi aa rahi hai.
Customer: Matlab refund vagaira ho sakta hai ye amount jo maine pay kiya hai.
Executive: Achcha us cheez ka puch rahe ho.
Customer: Ji. Okay abhi aapka service aapka 9 october se hi live hua hai na matlab mahine ha november chal raha hai matlab mahina bhar bhi nahi hua hai aapka hai na.
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: Thik hai to ye is bari me matlab mujhe lagta hai aap aap pichli bari mujhe bata rahe the ki by lead vagaira se kuch conversion nahi nikal raha is vajah se hai na.
Customer: Kuch conversion nahi nikal raha bhaiya abhi tak ek bhi call matlab meri aayi nahi hai aap apne me bhi system pe check kar lo maybe maine product kam dale ho ya jo bhi hai but itne product me bhi to aani chahiye.
Executive: Ha nahi.
Executive: Ha matlab wahi cheez jaise maine aapko bataya tha na shubham sir gorakhpur ke level pe to aapka matlab catalog dikh raha hoga aapne jaise gorakhpur me liya hai na ye.
Customer: Ha ji ha ji.
Executive: To matlab aapne matlab kaise jo bhi aapke paas aaye the kya field visit ke liye aaye the koi jaise.
Customer: Nahi nahi koi abhi tak nahi aaya hai aur in fact contact bhi nahi hua aap se hi hota hai aur baki unse hota hai lal ji se.
Executive: Ha matlab jinke through aap onboard hue wo puch raha hu mai jaise jiske through bhi aap is onboard hue honge na india mart pe.
Customer: Actually maine to khud hi wo kiya tha contact karke aaya tha mai.
Executive: Khud hi.
Executive: Achcha matlab mai ye isliye puch raha tha ki agar kisi client matlab team sales me rehte hai na hamare kuch person nahi nahi nahi nahi nahi unhone kuch miscommitment kara ho matlab wo cheez ka rehta hai.
Customer: Nahi nahi aisa kuch nahi tha mai maine aap hi logo se baat ki thi achcha achcha.
Customer: Productive nahi lag raha hai.
Executive: Productive ha mai dekho samajh raha hu sir wo na actually na usme ye hai na ki aap na thoda sa itna time bhi nahi i think de pa rahe honge ki by lead vagaira consume kare.
Customer: Ha nahi maine by lead starting me consume ki thi.
Customer: But koi bhi wo matlab as a business me convert nahi hui hai as a matlab aap bhi soch rahe hoge ki is tarah ka lag nahi raha mere ko ki mai karu aage kya karu ji ji sahi mai mai samajh raha hu thoda experience aapka kharab hua hai isme to yaha na ye hai na ki sir ye na aap samjhoge gorakhpur se mai dekh raha hu jaise gorakhpur ke level jaise aap call ka keh rahe ho mere ko ek to hai na call nahi aa rahi.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: To gorakhpur se call bhi nahi aa rahi hai ya fir waise by leads bhi nahi hai by lead bhi nahi hai matlab sara ha to shubham sir thoda basically mai wahi aap se jaanna chah raha tha ki kya isko wo kar sakte hai refund vagaira unhone bataya tha ji.
Customer: Ha theek hai.
Executive: Ha starting ka rehta hai matlab ye hai ki jyada din nahi hota na to aap samajh rahe ki hamare paas bhi aisa koi agar dent nahi aata matlab jaise risk pe bhi rehta hai na jaise abhi account ha aapka account na mere paas hai actually aapka.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: To agar aapka rehta hai ki agar aap refund ka post matlab agar rehte ye ki pehle to hum try karte hai ki samjhane ka ki agar is tarah se mil jayega business wo wali cheez hai na sir kyuki aapko maine batayi ki gorakhpur se aap samjho ki aath aath log hai aapki tarah hi matlab aapke jo deal me deal karte hai jaise akash nahi nahi mai jaise wo to aapki mai baat pura samajh raha hu mai pehle se bhi jaan raha tha convincing ki jarurat nahi thi.
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: To mai ek bari try kar leta hu puch leta hu agar sir aisa bata rahe hai kyuki ye na mai batau shubham sir fir hum log ha mai karwata hu wahi wahi discuss karte hai karna hai nahi karna hai wo log wo cheez to baad me dekh lenge.
Customer: Ha.
Executive: Wahi wahi shubham sir kyuki ye hai na ki by lead ka to sir pata hai thoda sa aisa hi hai ki jo bhi by lead post hongi jo bhi matlab buyer post kar denge hai na kai bar kya hai shubham sir pata hai apne as a supplier bhi pata hai jaan bujh ke ye loop hole ka fayda utha ke kyuki buyer free hai platform pe hai na buyer ko koi charges nahi dena hota to supplier samne se by lead post kar dete hai fir jab contact hota hai na to kehte hai ki aap itne ka de rahe ho hum usse kam me de rahe hai aap hamare to ye.
Customer: Achcha.
Executive: Hai na thoda sa ye bhi yaar ek maine aur bhi dekha ek log mere se contact kiye the just dial se aur kai aise actually site se jude the to unhone kaha ki jab by lead post hoti hai wo log bypass karke pehle hi de dete hai number vagaira.
Customer: Achcha.
Customer: Ab pata nahi aap logo ke me ye loop hole hai nahi hai but kai aur usme aisi cheeze chal rahi hai.
Executive: Nahi nahi aisa to nahi hai.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Jaise abhi aap ek bar aap aap na please baat karke ek bar mujhe bataiye mai baat kar leta hu.
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: Mai bata batata hu aapko.
Customer: Thik hai sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not getting any buyleads.

- Wants to know about refund policy.



Resolution:

- Executive checked the account details.

- Executive will check refund possibility and revert.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will revert to the customer.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, refund, subscription
